fileName: [Food for the soul] Hibi wa Sugiredo - S01E03.mkv
title: Food for the Soul
originalTitle: 日々は過ぎれど飯うまし
overview: Follow the daily lives of five new undergrad college girls as the eat, laugh, and deepen their friendships. They love delicious, want to have lots of fun together, study hard, and enjoy their college life to the fullest!

tv.originalShowTitle: 日々は過ぎれど飯うまし
tv.episodeOverview: Mako and the others decide to go out together on the weekend, but then Shinon's money for the trip disappears!
